alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 8:41PM AKST until November 26 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Winter Weather Advisories for Snow Accumulation Remain in Place for Portions of the Northern Alaska Panhandle... .A gale force low over the northeastern Gulf of Alaska has pushed a front through the panhandle. This front brought rain and snow to the area with heaviest snowfall in Haines and Skagway. The precip stayed as rain, or a mix at times, for those near Icy Strait and to the south. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, highest along the highways. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...In effect until 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
